ModMetaData.name: Climate Cycle Extended
ModMetaData.author: Leto
ModMetaData.description: Adds a new Climate Cycle gamecondition you can chose the duration and temperatue offset in the modsettings. Defaults are set to 4 years with a temprature offset of 40°. With these settings on a tile with a base avarage temperature of -10° to 25° you would get hot years from 30° to 65° and cold years from -50° to -15°.
